title: How to Send Direct Messages on TikTok Using Android

steps.title: Open the TikTok app.
steps.content: Open the TikTok app. The icon looks like a black square with a white music note on it. You can download TikTok from the Google Play Store . If you aren't already logged into your TikTok account , do so now.

steps.title: Tap Inbox.
steps.content: Tap Inbox . This is the tab on the right of the + .

steps.title: Tap a name.
steps.content: Tap a name. This will open the chat. [1] X Research source To message someone you don't follow, navigate to their profile and tap Message . You can send one message (or 3 if they have their settings set to Everyone ) until the user accepts your message request. If you don't see the option to send a message, the user has direct messages disabled in their privacy settings.

steps.title: Send a message.
steps.content: Send a message. You can send text, stickers, or even share videos. To add a sticker set, tap the sticker icon and select Add . Once it's added, tap Use to select a sticker. To create a video sticker, tap the Emoji icon and tap Create Sticker . Select a video, edit it, and then tap Next . Select a privacy setting and tap Create sticker . When you're finished, tap Send .

steps.title: Navigate to a video.
steps.content: Navigate to a video. You can find a video on your For You page, or you can search for a video by tapping the magnifying glass in the top-right corner.

steps.title: Tap the Share icon.
steps.content: Tap the Share icon. This is the right-facing arrow.

steps.title: Tap a user.
steps.content: Tap a user. This will send the video to the user.

steps.title: Tap Inbox.
steps.content: Tap Inbox . This is the tab on the right of the + .

steps.title: Tap +.
steps.content: Tap + . This is at the top-left corner. The New Chat page will open.

steps.title: Select the friends you want to include.
steps.content: Select the friends you want to include. These can only be friends you follow and who follow you back.

steps.title: Tap Start group chat.
steps.content: Tap Start group chat . This will create a new group chat. You can now send messages, stickers, and videos.

steps.title: Tap Profile.
steps.content: Tap Profile . This is in the bottom-right corner.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . You can find this in the top-right corner.

steps.title: Tap Settings and privacy.
steps.content: Tap Settings and privacy . A new page will open.

steps.title: Tap Privacy.
steps.content: Tap Privacy . This is under the Account header.

steps.title: Tap Direct messages.
steps.content: Tap Direct messages . You can find this under the Interactions header.

steps.title: Tap Allow direct messages from.
steps.content: Tap Allow direct messages from . This is at the top. Optional: you can toggle on/off Filtered requests and Read status on this page.

steps.title: Select a new setting.
steps.content: Select a new setting. You can select Everyone , Suggested friends , Friends , or No One . If you select No One , you can't send or receive any new direct messages.
